name: Take Care VR
description:
Face the darkest horror in this stunning new survival adventure!

WHERE IS SHE?

You find yourself in this dark room over and over again. Next to you a mysterious woman.
What is she trying to tell you?
Why are you there?
Follow her path and take the challenge of your life.
"Take Care..."

THEY ARE HERE!

Fight your way through horrible zombie hordes with different weapons.
Use your old flashlight to illuminate the dark corridors and solve the mysteries of your mind.
Collect important items in your backpack to advance and face your toughest hurdles.
But try not to make any noise, they might hear you...

HIGHLIGHTS

  • An immersive VR horror story that demands everything from you.
  • Fight cruel zombies and collect items to succeed.
  • Discover the dark places of a hopeless world.
  • Use two weapons at once for enhanced combat.
  • Train your skills at the tryout.
  • Spatial 3D audio provides a realistic experience.
  • Accessibility options for custom player or inventory height. (whole game can be played seated)
